## Problem 1


```{r}
bday_sim = function(n) {
  
  bdays = sample(1:365, size = 10, replace = TRUE)

  duplicate = length(unique(bdays)) < n
  
  return(duplicate)
  
}
```



```{r}
sim_res = 
  expand_grid(
    n = c(2, 50),
    iter = 1:10000
  ) |>
  mutate(res = map_lgl(n, bday_sim)) |>
  group_by(n) |>
  summarize(prob = mean(res, na.rm = TRUE))

sim_res |>
  ggplot(aes(x = n, y = prob)) +
  geom_line()
```
